mapper.sql: id, province, city, adcode, weather, temperature, winddirection, windpower, humidity, reporttime, create_time, `status`, `order`

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update zj_weather set province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adcode = #{adcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weather = #{weather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, winddirection = #{winddirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, windpower = #{windpower,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, humidity = #{humidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reporttime = #{reporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `order` = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from zj_weather where create_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and create_time <= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
